text: Melquiades Verduras Tascón (born 24 October 1968) is a Spanish rower. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Spain Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:People from Basauri Category:Sportspeople from Biscay
title: Melquiades Verduras
